verses.name: Exodus 40:9
verses.text: And thou shalt take the anointing oil, and anoint the tabernacle, and all that is therein, and shalt hallow it, and all the vessels thereof: and it shall be holy.

verses.name: Exodus 40:10
verses.text: And thou shalt anoint the altar of the burnt offering, and all his vessels, and sanctify the altar: and it shall be an altar most holy.

verses.name: Exodus 40:11
verses.text: And thou shalt anoint the laver and his foot, and sanctify it.

verses.name: Exodus 40:12
verses.text: And thou shalt bring Aaron and his sons unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and wash them with water.
